commands.name: help
commands.description: Shows the list of available commands or info about a specific command

commands.name: ping
commands.description: Shows detailed bot latency and system info

commands.name: say
commands.description: Make the bot repeat your message

commands.name: banner
commands.description: Get the banner of a user

commands.name: pfp
commands.description: Get the profile picture of a user

commands.name: groupicon
commands.description: Get the icon of the current Group DM

commands.name: serverbanner
commands.description: Get the server's banner

commands.name: serverpfp
commands.description: Get the server's profile picture

commands.name: snipe
commands.description: Retrieve recently deleted messages in this channel

commands.name: editsnipe
commands.description: Retrieve recently edited messages in this channel

commands.name: reactionsnipe
commands.description: Retrieve recently removed or added reactions in this channel

commands.name: coinflip
commands.description: Flip a coin

commands.name: coinflipchoose
commands.description: Flip a coin and bet on an outcome

commands.name: rockpaperscissors
commands.description: Play a game of Rock Paper Scissors

commands.name: tictactoe
commands.description: Play a game of Tic Tac Toe

commands.name: discovery
commands.description: View your library stats for an artist, song, or album

commands.name: lastfmsetup
commands.description: Manage your Last.fm account connection

commands.name: nowplaying
commands.description: Shows the current or last played track from Last.fm

commands.name: lastfmreactions
commands.description: Customize your Now Playing reactions

commands.name: imagetogif
commands.description: Convert an image to a GIF

commands.name: magik
commands.description: Apply a content-aware scale effect to an image

commands.name: tiktokrepost
commands.description: Repost a TikTok video with metadata

commands.name: update
commands.description: Hot-reload all command files
